content: A detailed listing of the ports on the ThinkPad E14 Gen 5 (AMD) chassis. Standard Ports (Full List with Specifications): 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (Always On), 1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 (support data transfer only), 1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0 and DisplayPort™ 1.4), 1x HDMI 2.1, up to 4K/60Hz, 1x Headphone/microphone combo jack (3.5mm), 1x Ethernet (RJ-45). The transfer speed of these ports will vary depending on factors like the host device's processing speed and file attributes, and may be slower than the theoretical speed. Theoretical maximum speeds are: USB 2.0: 480 Mbit/s; USB 3.2 Gen 1: 5 Gbit/s; USB 3.2 Gen 2: 10 Gbit/s; USB4 40Gbps / Thunderbolt™ 3/4: 40 Gbit/s.

Ethernet (RJ-45)
Kensington Nano Security Slot
USB-C 3.2 Gen 1
USB-C 3.2 Gen 2
USB 3.2 Gen 1 (Always On)
HDMI
Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)

content: Processor Family: AMD Ryzen™ 3 / 5 / 7 Processor. The full processor specifications are detailed below.

subfeatures.content: AMD Ryzen™ 3 7330U: 4 Cores, 8 Threads, 2.3GHz Base / 4.3GHz Max, 2MB L2 / 8MB L3 Cache, AMD Radeon™ Graphics
AMD Ryzen™ 5 5625U: 6 Cores, 12 Threads, 2.3GHz Base / 4.3GHz Max, 3MB L2 / 16MB L3 Cache, AMD Radeon™ Graphics
AMD Ryzen™ 5 7430U: 6 Cores, 12 Threads, 2.3GHz Base / 4.3GHz Max, 3MB L2 / 16MB L3 Cache, AMD Radeon™ Graphics
AMD Ryzen™ 5 7530U: 6 Cores, 12 Threads, 2.0GHz Base / 4.5GHz Max, 3MB L2 / 16MB L3 Cache, AMD Radeon™ Graphics
AMD Ryzen™ 7 7730U: 8 Cores, 16 Threads, 2.0GHz Base / 4.5GHz Max, 4MB L2 / 16MB L3 Cache, AMD Radeon™ Graphics

content: Available operating system options are: Windows® 11 Pro, Windows® 11 Home, Windows® 11 Home Single Language, Windows® 11 DG Windows® 10 Pro 64 (for special bid only), or No preload operating system.

content: Graphics: AMD Radeon™ Graphics, Integrated, Shared Memory, Share CPU TDP, DirectX® 12.
Supports up to 4 independent displays (native display and 3 external monitors via HDMI® and USB-C®).

subfeatures.content: HDMI® supports up to $4096\times2160@30$Hz
USB-C® supports up to $5120\times2160@60$Hz

content: AMD SoC (System on Chip) platform.
Max Memory: Up to 40GB (8GB soldered + 32GB SO-DIMM) DDR4-3200. Memory Slots: One memory soldered to systemboard, one DDR4 SO-DIMM slot, dual-channel capable. Memory Type: DDR4-3200.

subfeatures.content: Max Memory: Up to 40GB (8GB soldered + 32GB SO-DIMM) DDR4-3200
Memory Slots: One memory soldered to systemboard, one DDR4 SO-DIMM slot, dual-channel capable
Memory Type: DDR4-3200

content: Max Storage Support: Up to two drives, $2\times$ M.2 SSD. Storage Slots: Two M.2 slots: One M.2 2242 PCIe 3.0 x4 slot and one M.2 2280 PCIe 3.0 x4 slot. The M.2 2280 slot supports an M.2 2242 SSD (up to 512GB) or an M.2 2280 SSD (up to 1TB).

subfeatures.content: M.2 2242 SSD up to 512GB, PCIe NVMe, PCIe 3.0 x4 interface
M.2 2280 SSD up to 1TB, PCIe NVMe, PCIe 3.0 x4 interface

content: Card Reader: No card reader.
Audio Chip: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek ALC3287 codec. Speakers: Stereo speakers, $2\text{W}\times2$, Dolby Audio™. Microphone: Dual-microphone array, Dolby Voice.

subfeatures.content: Camera: HD 720p, with privacy shutter, fixed focus
Camera: FHD 1080p, with privacy shutter, fixed focus

content: Battery Options: Integrated Li-Polymer 47Wh or 57Wh battery, both support Rapid Charge (charge up to 80% in 1hr). Rapid charge is only guaranteed when the computer is turned off, in standby, or in hibernation mode.

subfeatures.content: Power Adapter: 65W USB-C (2-pin or 3-pin), supports PD 3.0, 100-240V, 50-60Hz.
Battery Life (MobileMark 2018, 57Wh): up to 12.6 hr. (Note: Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.)

content: Screen-to-Body Ratio: 90%. Touchscreen: On-cell multi-touch, supports 10-point touch, or Non-touch.

subfeatures.content: 14" WUXGA ($1920\times1200$): Non-touch, IPS, 300nits, Anti-glare, 16:10, 800:1 Contrast, 45% NTSC, 60Hz, TÜV Low Blue Light (Software)
14" WUXGA ($1920\times1200$): Multi-touch, IPS, 300nits, Anti-glare, 16:10, 800:1 Contrast, 45% NTSC, 60Hz, TÜV Low Blue Light (Software)
14" 2.2K ($2240\times1400$): Non-touch, IPS, 300nits, Anti-glare, 16:10, 1500:1 Contrast, 100% SRGB, 60Hz, Eyesafe Certified 2.0

content: Keyboard: 6-row, spill-resistant, multimedia Fn keys with Unified Communications controls. UltraNav™: TrackPoint pointing device and Mylar surface multi-touch 3-button Trackpad, $56 \times 115$ mm ($2.24 \times 4.53$ inches).

subfeatures.content: Keyboard Backlight: LED backlight or Non-backlight options.

content: WWAN: No support. SIM Card: No physical SIM card inbox. NFC: No support.

content: Various docking solutions supported via USB-C®.
Other Security: ThinkShield, Camera privacy shutter, (Optional) IR camera for Windows Hello (facial recognition).

subfeatures.content: Security Chip: Firmware TPM 2.0 integrated in SoC or Discrete TPM 2.0, TCG certified, FIPS 140-2 certified
Physical Lock: Kensington Nano Security Slot™, $2.5 \times 6$ mm
Smart Card Reader: No smart card reader
Fingerprint Reader: Touch style fingerprint reader integrated in power button or No fingerprint reader
BIOS Security: NVMe password, Power-on password, Supervisor password, Self-healing BIOS

content: Dimensions (W x D x H): $313 \times 219.3 \times 17.99$ mm ($12.32 \times 8.63 \times 0.71$ inches) (dimensions may vary depending on configurations). Case Color options: Arctic grey and Graphite black.

Case Material: Aluminium (top), aluminium (bottom) | Weight: Starting at 1.43 kg (3.15 lbs)

content: System management options include Non-vPro.

Maximum altitude (without pressurization): 3048 m (10,000 ft). Operating Temperature: $5^{\circ}C$ $(41^{\circ}F)$ to $35^{\circ}C$ $(95^{\circ}F)$. Storage and transportation in original shipping package: $-20^{\circ}C$ $(-4^{\circ}F)$ to $60^{\circ}C$ $(140^{\circ}F)$. Storage without package: $5^{\circ}C$ $(41^{\circ}F)$ to $43^{\circ}C$ $(109^{\circ}F)$. Operating Relative Humidity: 8% to 95% at wet-bulb temperature $23^{\circ}C$ $(73^{\circ}F)$. Storage and transportation Relative Humidity: 5% to 95% at wet-bulb temperature $27^{\circ}C$ $(81^{\circ}F)$.
The system utilizes Post Consumer Content (PCC) recycled plastic in several components and uses low-temperature solder.

30% PCC recycled plastic used in speaker enclosure
90% PCC recycled plastic used in standard 65W adapter
